alert.note: Alert for Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:26AM CDT until April 09 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Oconto River above Oconto affecting Oconto County. For the Oconto River...including Oconto...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconto River above Oconto. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Floodwaters begin to spread into a public campground in the City of Oconto. Water approaches the backyards of several homes along the river in Oconto...and there is widespread lowland flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10 AM Saturday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10 AM CDT Saturday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening or early on Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.3 feet on 04/27/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
